scan_table_check.description: An ATF Test Suite should have a unique name. Two or more test suites with the same name may indicate a user mistake. The check controls whether a test suite in the scanned application have name duplicates inside or outside the application.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - ATF suite name is unique
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Rename the duplicate ATF test suite or delete it. Keep in mind that ATF tests may have been added to only one or both suites that have the same name. So the developer should make sure that all required tests are contained in the suite that is kept.
scan_table_check.short_description: An ATF Test Suite name must be unique
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - ATF suite name is unique
